title: Update notebooks to fix automation
text:
# Update notebooks to fix automation

Hi Ryan,
Can we update this [notebook ](https://github.com/KxSystems/kdbai-samples/blob/main/metadata_filtering/metadata_filtering_demo.ipynb) to remove these lines please
os.environ["KDBAI_ENDPOINT"]="http://localhost:8082/"
os.environ["KDBAI_API_KEY"]=""

Also need a line changed here [notebook ](https://github.com/KxSystems/kdbai-samples/blob/main/music_recommendation/music_recommendation.ipynb)

nltk.download('punkt_tab')
to
nltk.download('punkt')


## Top Comments

**gflood-kx**: actually we need both for CI

```
nltk.download('punkt_tab')
nltk.download('punkt')
```

metadata.author: gflood-kx
top_comments:
**gflood-kx**: actually we need both for CI

```
nltk.download('punkt_tab')
nltk.download('punkt')
```

title: Auth error with ImageSearch sample in colab
text:
# Auth error with ImageSearch sample in colab

I cannot connect to HuggingFace via colab, works fine in VSCode

https://colab.research.google.com/github/KxSystems/kdbai-samples/blob/main/image_search/image_search.ipynb


`---------------------------------------------------------------------------
HTTPError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
[/usr/local/lib/python3.11/dist-packages/huggingface_hub/utils/_http.py](https://localhost:8080/#) in hf_raise_for_status(response, endpoint_name)
    408     try:
--> 409         response.raise_for_status()
    410     except HTTPError as e:

13 frames
HTTPError: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://huggingface.co/api/models/KxSystems/mri_resnet_model/revision/main

The above exception was the direct cause of the following exception:

HfHubHTTPError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
HfHubHTTPError: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://huggingface.co/api/models/KxSystems/mri_resnet_model/revision/main (Request ID: Root=1-681cce22-6abc4fa8546d77177cf3765d;fc0a7f72-aa2b-442e-bd8a-e8f3d2453e18)

Invalid credentials in Authorization header

The above exception was the direct cause of the following exception:

LocalEntryNotFoundError                   Traceback (most recent call last)
[/usr/local/lib/python3.11/dist-packages/huggingface_hub/_snapshot_download.py](https://localhost:8080/#) in snapshot_download(repo_id, repo_type, revision, cache_dir, local_dir, library_name, library_version, user_agent, proxies, etag_timeout, force_download, token, local_files_only, allow_patterns, ignore_patterns, max_workers, tqdm_class, headers, endpoint, local_dir_use_symlinks, resume_download)
    233         else:
    234             # Otherwise: most likely a connection issue or Hub downtime => let's warn the user
--> 235             raise LocalEntryNotFoundError(
    236                 "An error happened while trying to locate the files on the Hub and we cannot find the appropriate"
    237                 " snapshot folder for the specified revision on the local disk. Please check your internet connection"

LocalEntryNotFoundError: An error happened while trying to locate the files on the Hub and we cannot find the appropriate snapshot folder for the specified revision on the local disk. Please check your internet connection and try again.`

## Top Comments

**RyanSieglerKX**: Was able to successfully run in Colab

metadata.author: gflood-kx
top_comments: **RyanSieglerKX**: Was able to successfully run in Colab

title: Notebook mentions tokenizer in readme but readme does not
text:

title: Document search fails if data folder exists
text:
# Document search fails if data folder exists

We need to update in cell 7
!mkdir ./data
to 
!mkdir -pv ./data

title: Issue with imagebind sample
text:
# Issue with imagebind sample

kdbai-samples/multimodal_RAG_ImageBind/multi_modal_ImageBind.ipynb

Observe the following error when importing required modules

`ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'torchvision.transforms.functional_tensor'
`

title: image_search: typo
text:
# image_search: typo

Crate Vector DB Table => Create Vector DB Table

title: Update OPENAI_API_KEY retrieval in KDBAI_Advanced_RAG_Demo
text:
# Update OPENAI_API_KEY retrieval in KDBAI_Advanced_RAG_Demo

Please update section for obtaining OPENAPI key from:
os.environ["OPENAI_API_KEY"] = getpass("OpenAI API key: ")

to
OPENAI_API_KEY = (
    os.environ["OPENAI_API_KEY"]
    if "OPENAI_API_KEY" in os.environ
    else getpass("OPENAI API key: ")
)
